products.name: Red Bull Energy Drink
products.description: Red Bull Energy Drink is appreciated worldwide by top athletes, busy professionals, college students and travelers on long journeys. The original Red Bull Energy Drink. Giving wiiings to people and ideas since 1987.

main.name: Caffeine
main.description: Each 250 ml can of Red Bull Energy Drink contains 80 mg of caffeine. Caffeine helps to improve concentration and increase alertness.

main.name: Taurine
main.description: One of the most abundant amino acids in the heart and muscles. Taurine is involved in a range of processes including regulation of water/electrolyte balance at the cellular level.

main.name: B-group vitamins
main.description: B-group vitamins contribute to the reduction of tiredness and fatigue.

main.name: Sugars
main.description: One 250 ml can of Red Bull Energy Drink contains 27 g of sugars, a type of carbohydrate, which are a fuel source for the body – including the brain and muscles.

main.name: Water
main.description: Water is the main ingredient of Red Bull. Dedication to its quality contributes to the iconic taste in every sip.

benefits.title: Stay alert
benefits.description: Red Bull Energy Drink contains caffeine that helps to improve concentration and increase alertness.

benefits.title: Reduce fatigue
benefits.description: Red Bull Energy Drink contains B-group vitamins (niacin, pantothenic acid, B6, B12), which contribute to the reduction of tiredness and fatigue.

benefits.title: Kickstart your day
benefits.description: Red Bull Energy Drink contains sugar, a fast-absorbing form of carbohydrate involved in a wide range of biological processes and an energy source for the brain and muscles.

products.name: Red Bull Sugarfree
products.slogan: The formula that gives you wiiings
products.description: Red Bull Sugarfree provides the same great taste and benefits as Red Bull Energy Drink but without sugar. Perfect for those who want to reduce their sugar intake while still enjoying the wings.

main.name: Caffeine
main.description: Each 250 ml can of Red Bull Sugarfree contains 80 mg of caffeine. Caffeine helps to improve concentration and increase alertness.

main.name: B-group vitamins
main.description: B-group vitamins contribute to the reduction of tiredness and fatigue.

main.name: Sucralose & Acesulfame K
main.description: Sucralose & acesulfame K are among the most-tested and most-used sugar substitutes worldwide.

main.name: Taurine
main.description: One of the most abundant amino acids in the heart and muscles. Taurine is involved in a range of processes including regulation of water/electrolyte balance at the cellular level.

main.name: Water
main.description: Water is the main ingredient of Red Bull. Dedication to its quality contributes to the iconic taste in every sip.

benefits.title: Stay alert
benefits.description: Contains caffeine that helps to improve concentration and increase alertness.

benefits.title: Reduce fatigue
benefits.description: Contains B-group vitamins which contribute to the reduction of tiredness and fatigue.

benefits.title: Zero sugar
benefits.description: All the benefits of Red Bull without sugar, using high-quality sugar substitutes.

products.name: Red Bull Zero
products.slogan: The formula that gives you wiiings
products.description: Red Bull Zero delivers the same great taste and functional benefits as Red Bull Energy Drink but with zero calories and zero sugar. Perfect for those seeking an energy boost without compromising their dietary goals.

main.name: Caffeine
main.description: Each 250 ml can of Red Bull Zero contains 80 mg of caffeine. Caffeine helps to improve concentration and increase alertness.

main.name: Taurine
main.description: One of the most abundant amino acids in the heart and muscles. Taurine is involved in a range of processes including regulation of water/electrolyte balance at the cellular level.

main.name: B-group vitamins
main.description: Vitamins are essential micronutrients that are required for maintaining normal body functions.

main.name: Sucralose, Sodium Cyclamate, Sodium Saccharin
main.description: A combination of low and no-calorie sweeteners are used instead of sugars, and they are some of the most used non-caloric sweeteners worldwide.

main.name: Water
main.description: Water is the main ingredient of Red Bull. Dedication to its quality contributes to the iconic taste in every sip.

benefits.title: Stay alert
benefits.description: Contains caffeine that helps to improve concentration and increase alertness.

benefits.title: Reduce fatigue
benefits.description: Contains essential B-group vitamins for maintaining normal body functions.

benefits.title: Zero calories, zero sugar
benefits.description: All the benefits of Red Bull with zero calories and zero sugar.

metadata.brandSlogan: Giving wiiings to people and ideas since 1987

companyInfo.production: Austria, Switzerland, and the United States
companyInfo.safety: Health authorities around the world have concluded that Red Bull Energy Drink is safe to consume

generalInfo.caffeineLimit: Up to 400 mg of caffeine per day is safe for healthy adults (according to EFSA, US FDA and Health Canada)
generalInfo.purchaseLocations: Grocery stores, convenience stores, major retailers, gas stations, and online via e-commerce sites
